meanings.definition: A store selling food and other household goods.
meanings.sent1: I went to the grocery to buy some bread and milk.
meanings.sent2: My mom always makes a list before going to the grocery store.
meanings.sent3: The grocery was so crowded that I couldn't find the cereal aisle!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the grocery store like a beacon in the night.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh produce in the grocery lingered in my mind all day.

meanings.definition: The items sold in a grocery store.
meanings.sent1: I need to pick up some groceries on my way home from work.
meanings.sent2: The groceries in my cart included fruits, vegetables, and pasta.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the groceries are all for her and tries to open the bags.
meanings.sent4: The groceries spilled out of the bag like a colorful waterfall.
meanings.sent5: Carrying the heavy groceries home made my arms ache.
